metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25510 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK for Linux and Windows contains a NULL pointer dereference in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against a malformed binary may cause a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
